original_title: Living Fossils Evolution: The Grand Experiment
overview: Based on the popular book series “Evolution: The Grand Experiment” by Dr. Carl Werner. This DVD has the feel of a PBS documentary, with British narrator Andres Williams, and contains spectacular underwater footage of Dr. Werner diving at the Great Barrier Reef in Australia and the coral reefs in the Caribbean Sea, plus footage from dinosaur dig sites in Europe and North America.
title: Living Fossils Evolution: The Grand Experiment
